display_long_description:
Welcome to Build Blob Brawl, the exciting multiplayer mixed reality brawler! Turn your environment into a battleground. Customize it to create the ultimate fighting arena. Then pick your blob and get ready to battle to become King of the Living Room.

BUILD!

Scan your environment and watch it transform into an arena. Craft your battlefield by adding unique objects and obstacles and get ready to fight. Next round, move the obstacles and change it up. No two levels are exactly the same. The only limit is your imagination.

BLOB!

Fight for glory using adorable blob characters. They’re cute. They’re colourful and expressive. They’re also deadly fighting machines (well, blobs) whose only goal is to destroy their opponent. Pick your fighter, enter the arena, and get ready to…

BRAWL!

You and your friend are ready to rumble. The arena is full of obstacles Maybe you jump atop a plate or an overdue library book. Or maybe you block your friend’s path with some barrels. First one to knock their opponent outside the arena wins.

It’s creative! It’s exhilarating! It’s Build Blob Brawl!
